body:
Hello everyone! Athena here! :D

I decided to make a little hub here so that you guys can check for updates on my YouTube channel: AthenaSuDimou0811 easily when you go to the Forums. Of course, it is Avicus-related. I hope you guys enjoy my videos, because if you do, you need to give me a thumbs up and a click of the subscribe button! If you have something you don't like or agree, please make sure to write it down in the comment section below. I will make sure to check it out and try to improve. I will update it as much as I can, so please make sure to check this thread often! :D

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Goods:

My YouTube channel: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxS3u40g_KBNu2EXb5Xb_YA
Halcyon I | Avicus | Episode #2: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VZjhkVR7QKU
Avicus Network Episode #1 Fossil Canyon: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-6aNoQ-oeC8
[REDACTED]
How to Fix a "Messed Up" Skin in Blender (Short Tutorial): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mEUHfmRq5fE
How to Change your Skin in Blender: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y7lasgsMUf0
[REDACTED]
[REDACTED}

title: Athena's Video Hub

replies.body: Here is a tip (my opinion) in the video u shouldn't talk 2 much or show ur face then just play music but at the start on how ur face is showing and ur explaining u did well remember just my personal opinion also it depends on the music u play if u play music u tipcally wanna mute the minecraft music GL :D
replies.body_tagged: Here is a tip (my opinion) in the video u shouldn't talk 2 much or show ur face then just play music but at the start on how ur face is showing and ur explaining u did well remember just my personal opinion also it depends on the music u play if u play music u tipcally wanna mute the minecraft music GL :D

replies.body: Wait u didn't do 2 bad but try 2 be fun if u can
replies.body_tagged: Wait u didn't do 2 bad but try 2 be fun if u can

replies.body: Thanks! Yeah, I kinda realized that I sound like I am sick in some videos :D I will try to improve on that. But how can I be fun? Do you have any suggestions?
replies.body_tagged: Thanks! Yeah, I kinda realized that I sound like I am sick in some videos :D I will try to improve on that. But how can I be fun? Do you have any suggestions?

reply_to.body: Wait u didn't do 2 bad but try 2 be fun if u can
reply_to.body_tagged: Wait u didn't do 2 bad but try 2 be fun if u can

replies.body: Well first of u r sick hope u feel better and u can be funny u can describe other people or if u have optifine u can make the video zoom in on that and in slow motion when some1 makes a mistake or falls in the void or just when a player is acting dumb oh if u rush and become good at ninja ing that will keep the viewer entertained or u could play with some1 (cute skins work)ummm maybe u can try other servers or look up videos so u can try to improve ur skin GL:D
